A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Episode 8 was not good and theirs no other way to put it. They diminished the Fans of this universe by ruining characters and leaving way to many plot holes.
Rey is a horribly written character and the story is underwhelming and unbelievable.
The story and writing is really what suffers here and even great visuals can't replace that.
This movie is an example of why there should have never been a sequel trilogy.
